# Game Project - Copilot Instructions

This is a simple game project using Vite and vanilla JavaScript.

## Project Setup Status
- [x] Copilot instructions file created
- [x] Project scaffolded with Vite
- [x] Game code customized with movable rectangle
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] Development server running

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `main.js` - Game logic with canvas and player controls
- `style.css` - Styling

## Controls
- Use Arrow Left/Right or A/D keys to move the rectangle
